name: Mad House Cat House
description:
Raphael, age 20. He hates cats. His life gets turned upside down when he finds a cat left out in the rain, and decides to give them a chance. Immediately upon entering the cat cuts the power, and starts breaking things. Will he regret his decision?

Press E to interact, and move the mouse to move your flashlight around the room! Press G, H, and J to switch levels! Credits:

Chase Anderson: Lead Programmer

Adam El-Kishawy: Assistant Programmer, Organizer, Assistant Artist

Emir Sahbegovic: Game Design, Assistant Art

@kaiki_rou: Art Director, Lead Artist
